function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for inaccurate similarity computation leading to incorrect matches or nonmatches","Impact":"Incorrect matches or nonmatches could lead to incorrect data integration and analysis, impacting decision-making.","Mitigation":"Regular validation and verification of similarity computation results, employing multiple similarity measures, and setting threshold ranges for inference rules.","Technologies":"Similarity measures, threshold setting, validation tools","People":"Data scientists, domain experts","Owner":"Data science team"},{"Description":"Unresolved entity pairs leading to incomplete data integration","Impact":"Incomplete data integration can lead to biased analysis, incomplete knowledge graph construction, and inaccurate decision-making.","Mitigation":"Maximizing the inference power of new questions, iterative question-selection algorithm, minimizing the number of unresolved entity pairs.","Technologies":"Question-selection algorithm, iterative algorithms, data integration tools","People":"Data scientists, domain experts","Owner":"Data science team"},{"Description":"Lack of validation for human labeling","Impact":"Unvalidated human labeling may introduce errors in the dataset and affect the accuracy of the integrated knowledge graph.","Mitigation":"Implement validation processes for human labeling, cross-validation by multiple human labelers, and quality control measures.","Technologies":"Validation tools, cross-validation tools, quality control tools","People":"Data scientists, human labelers","Owner":"Data science team"}]}
